item.description:
REAL LEAGUE, not a meetup - Fun Sport & Social Group is has room on one team for the SPRING 2010 coed recreational softball league. Games will be on Sun/Mon/Wed nights one game per week. Games in Medford, Watertown, JP and Bunker Hill CC.

First game Sunday May 9. Season ends at the end of July. You get 9 games and then playoffs.

PLEASE EMAIL ME DIRECTLY AT fssg@hotmail.com ASAP and I will give your contact info to that captains who needs players.   You must have a fun attitude and no screaming at the ump or other teams. We all have a blast playing in the league.

 

YOU MUST EMAIL ME DIRECTLY AT fssg@hotmail.com TO GET PLACED ON A TEAM!

Kathy Mahoney
President, Fun Sport & Social Group
item.name: FSSG Coed Softball
